result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for providing a client interface to interact with a wallet proxy service, handling requests and responses related to user balances, activities, NFT items, and token prices.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating the client logic and data models separately to promote reusability and maintainability.

internal/infras/walletproxy/client.go.purpose: This file implements a client for interacting with a wallet proxy service, providing methods to retrieve user balances, activities, NFT items, and token prices.

internal/infras/walletproxy/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for handling wallet proxy requests and responses related to fiat tokens and fungible balances.
